overview: In the Jinyuan Club, there are five Jinyuan kings, one egg manager, and two senior chefs, one named General Cannon Barrel and the other named Mr. Mosquito. The cannon made fried gold coins for the famous dishes they like to eat, and the mosquitoes prepared plasma wine for them, as well as diamonds and so on. The five kings proposed to eat the stars, and the manager ordered the gun barrel to get more gold dollars and then diamonds, and the mosquitoes to get some plasma, and asked Dr. Muddy to count the number of stars in the sky.
title: The Dream of Gold
